activities: Greystar manages residential rental communities on behalf of third-party owners.  Prospective residents provide Greystar applications to lease apartments/flats the communities which contain personal information.  Personal information on residents who lease apartments/flats are maintained in electronic and hard copy format by Greystar.  Greystar employs personnel in this effort and maintains personal information on these individuals in electronic and hard copy format.
eucountries: Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names, phone numbers, addresses, national identifier numbers, phone numbers, bank account numbers, email addresses, employment information
privacyprograms: Greystar has robust data security policies in place including a written information security plan and incident response plan for our organization.  We have crafted three separate privacy policies for the US, UK and Safe Harbor.  Greystar is registered with the ICO in the UK as required by their Data Protection Act as well as the BBB Safe Harbor program.
recoursemech: Greystar is registered with the Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
